casebody.data:
State of Connecticut v. Aaron Sloan (11906)

O’Connell, Schaller and Freedman, Js.

Argued May 1 decision released May 30, 1995 Barry A. Butler, assistant public defender, for the appellant (defendant). Richard F. Jacobson, assistant state’s attorney, with whom, on the brief, were Donald A. Browne, state’s attorney, and Linda Howe, assistant state’s attorney, for the appellee (state). Per Curiam.

The judgment is affirmed.
